name: Jiannong Cao 0001
content: Jiannong Cao at Hong Kong PolyU Jiannong Cao Vice President (Education) Otto Poon Charitable Foundation Professor in Data Science Chair Professor of Distributed and Mobile Computing Director of Institute for Higher Education Research and Development Associate Director of PolyU-Nanjing Technology and Innovation Research Institute Member of Academia Europaea Fellow of Hong Kong Academy of Engineering Science Member of Executive Committee of the International Alliance of Academicians Fellow of IEEE (Computer Society) Fellow of CCF Distinguished Member of ACM BSc (Nanjing University) MSc, Ph.D. (Washington State University) Department of Computing The Hong Kong Polytechnic University Address: Hung Hom, Kowloon, Hong Kong Office: PQ819, Mong Man Wai Building Office No.: (852) 2766 7275 Fax No.: (852) 2774 0842 Email: csjcao@comp.polyu.edu.hk Google Scholar ORCID ID: 0000-0002-2725-2529 Scopus Author ID: 7403354073 Home Grants Publications Teaching Service Award IMCL
